citation.article-title: Pedobacter roseus sp. nov., isolated from a hypertrophic pond, and emended description of the genus Pedobacter
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the genus Pedobacter

In addition to the properties given in descriptions of the genus Pedobacter in earlier studies (Steyn et al., 1998; Margesin et al., 2003; Shivaji et al., 2005; Vanparys et al., 2005), the colony colour of strains belonging to the genus is whitish, yellowish or pinkish on TSA and/or on nutrient agar.
